title: Do not disturb override not working for Google Calendar App
content:
How do I turn on the vibrations for calendar events when do not disturb is enabled?

I use the normal Google Calendar app and have turned on all notifications for both calendar and task notifications, so:

default
vibration on
notification dot on
override do not disturb

In do not disturb I have allowed the calendar app to interrupt do not disturb with all notifications, so:

allow all notifications on
calendar notifications on
background sync on
task notifications on

In the do not disturb settings I also have allowed reminders and calendar events to interrupt do not disturb in the "alarms and other interruptions" settings.

However, whenever I get a calendar notification for an event, the notification will appear but the phone will not vibrate.

Is there a solution for this problem?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
